title: The Heroic Week of Victor Yang: The Elder Protector
summary: Victor Yang, a 71-year-old retired coach, inadvertently gains the power to transmit his wisdom telepathically, which he uses to guide and protect his community over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Victor Yang, ein 71-jähriger pensionierter Trainer, gewinnt unbeabsichtigt die Fähigkeit, seine Weisheit telepathisch zu übertragen, und verwendet sie, um seine Gemeinschaft im Laufe einer Woche zu führen und zu schützen.
summaryDutch: Victor Yang, een 71-jarige gepensioneerde coach, krijgt onbedoeld de kracht om zijn wijsheid telepathisch over te dragen, die hij gebruikt om zijn gemeenschap gedurende een week te leiden en te beschermen.
summaryFrench: Victor Yang, un entraîneur à la retraite de 71 ans, acquiert involontairement le pouvoir de transmettre sa sagesse télépathiquement, qu'il utilise pour guider et protéger sa communauté au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Victor Yang starts his week with an unusual feeling during his morning meditation. A strange energy courses through him, leaving him feeling unusually enlightened.
While coaching a local entrepreneur, Victor unintentionally communicates an entire business strategy telepathically. Amazed by his new power, he decides to explore it further.
Victor uses his power at a town meeting, silently diffusing a heated argument about local issues. The townspeople leave feeling inexplicably united and peaceful.
A crisis at a nearby school when a fire breaks out. Victor, not present at the site, remotely calms panicked children and guides them to safety.
Victor is contacted by an old friend suffering from loneliness. He uses his ability to send comforting thoughts and mental support, renewing their friendship.
Feeling confident, Victor gathers local volunteers to initiate community projects. Inspired by his energy, the town witnesses a surge of teamwork and optimism.
Reflecting on his week, Victor realizes the immense potential of his powers and commits to using them for the good of his community.

ending: From that week onward, Victor Yang became more than just a retired coach; he became a guardian, watching over his community with a wise and gentle mind.
moral: Great power can come in the quietest of moments and from the most unexpected of individuals.
